features: *Note* Our Witch Hazel does not have a Lavender scent, but provides the natural health benefits of Lavender in the Witch Hazel. This is due to our Homeopathic formula.
100% Pure Unscented Witch Hazel with ZERO chemicals, additives, preservatives, or alcohol.
It’s NOT just water, it’s Homeopathic! Check out our image chart in the photos to see which type is right for your skin.
The first Homeopathic Witch Hazel. 100% herbs and plants. Clean, healthy, and powerful!

How Does It Work? Inside the bottle are super charged electrons created from our herb and plant based formula. These electrons pass on its energy to you helping your body rebuild and give nutrients to your cells.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How Does It Work? Little Goes Far! A little can do a whole lot in Homeopathy!This electron gets fired up from the herbs and plants inside our product and gives it the strength to pass it onto you. Like Cures Like! The Law of SimilarsSince these are both electrons, the one with energy will help out the one without energy and power it back up to super charged! Time To work! Once our product hits your skin/hair it starts working right away!Don’t forget the more you use, the more the body can make use of it and the more you’ll notice it working.

Form Liquid Skin Type All (Refer to product image chart) Bottle Size 6x2.5x2.5 inches Volume 12 Fl Oz Scent Unscented (Every Witch Hazel is Unscented) Directions Pour a small amount on a cotton pad or finger tips, and gently wipe skin. Use daily. Use as an astringent for dry skin, rashes, cuts, bruises, bug bites, and more. Use as a carrier for essential oils. Color Clear Formula Homeopathic Ingredients Purified Water, Witch Hazel, and Marshmallow Leaf. (Add Rose Petals, Cucumber, Lavender, or Dried Coconut depending on the type.) Features 1 Made without chemicals or preservatives Features 2 No alcohol or any additives Disclaimer **There is a natural reaction between the Witch Hazel and Marshmallow Leaf where you might see floating debris, this is a natural byproduct of the preservation of the Witch Hazel.**

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Older and Sensitive / Dry Skin
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to get the same sense of "definitely cleansed" which I used to get from astringents as a teen with elevated oil levels. This very gentle formulation fits the bill. I am very sensitive to botanicals and so I was a little cautious (marshmallow is used in this). But no redness or irritation. Just a nice fresh feel, so I use it after a shower or after directly washing my face. I have even used it, in a hurry, in lieu of a good facial wash. Then my moisturizer can go on afterwards without reacting against anything. Very gentle yet refreshing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great option, especially for the price. It was one of the best ones I found that did not contain alcohol or extra, unnecessary ingredients!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars IT ISN'T NOT A CLEAR SOLUTION (naturally!) It has NEEDED floaty things in it. SEE MORE!
reviews.reviewText: PLEASE NOTE-- This has been updated as this product has changed.I get the unscented plain witch hazel. I am used to the floaty things as I do understand it is a natural occurrence of a natural product.HOWEVER, my most recent bottle purchase has me convinced there is absolutely NO witch hazel in this at all-- none-- and my nether regions would agree. NO floaty things but no witch hazel either!This latest bottle I feel has the marshmallow extract only-- it is like heavy water if that makes sense. BUT no witch hazel is in this-- unless they waved a fine mist over the bottle before sealing it so the ration is 1 million parts of water to one part witch hazel.Bummer, now I have to look elsewhere for witch hazel, cause this heavy marshmallow extract water does not contain enough witch hazel to be effective. Buyer beware-- there is no concentration listed on the bottle but I'd suspect the witch hazel content is ten percent (and that is being generous with my estimation) so you're paying for probably over 90 percent water)There is no detectable classic witch hazel smell either. NONE.My first bottle of this stuff was good, my second and now third bottle from Amazon are trash. Buyer beware.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------This is my first review before I'd been duped into buying water on amazon:I love this product and use it on my nether regions, regions that we don't chat about much but need gentle cleansing and healing more than a cleansing wipe can accomplish.If you read the disclaimer before having a freakout you'll realize the floaty things are supposed to be there-- if it were perfectly clear that would be a hint there was no marshmallow leaf extract in there and your witch hazel wouldn't be naturally preserved.You ever cut a potato and have your cutting board (and the potato) discolor? Nothing wrong with it, just a natural process. So stop with the "it has floaty things in it" stuffs LOL. It is supposed to-- that is a natural reaction in the solution and actually means things are good.All I can say is this stuff works better than anything.I am a bit concerned of recent posts that say they've been duped into buying water/watered down product.I'll post again with an update if my next purchase isn't up to par.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such nice stuff
reviews.reviewText: I love this way. This makes your face feel. I do it after I wash my face then use it and then put my moisturizer on. Really makes a difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like the healing this product brings to my skin
reviews.reviewText: I like how this product healed my irritated skin. It has a fresh scent and is not too strong. However, after a few weeks it has some kind of brown stuff floating in the bottle. I don't know what causes it, or if it is natural for this to happen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this a toner for my face and on irritated skin i.e. bug bites. It is very refreshing. I wish it had a natural witch hazel fragrance though Cannot really detect a scent and I have made my own witch hazel before and it smelled more pungent than this. I think i bought the marshmallow one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magic Witch Hazel in a Bottle
reviews.reviewText: I’ve purchased this product at least five times now. It is currently unavailable and I am worried that it is no longer going to be sold. I originally had bought this witch hazel to add to my peri bottle and help promote healing after having my son. It was the only witch hazel I could find that was alcohol free and didn’t have any added or harmful ingredients. I believe that it helped immensely with my healing. I had some left over and remembered seeing other review(s) of people that used this as a face toner, so I decided to give it a try on my face. I had been struggling with sudden adult acne for years and nothing else seemed to help. I figured it was gentle enough to use for my postpartum care that I might as well try it on my face. I am very glad that I did because it helped so much! I now use this on my face twice a day. Please don’t stop selling this, I cannot live without it! I’d also like to add that because I’ve purchased this product so many times I can attest that the company has added a safety seal to the product. Don’t be scared off by the other reviews stating there were particles floating around in the bottle. This is because of the natural ingredient used to preserve freshness. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's so hard to find clean products that isn't so very expensive. This is the product I feel safe using.
